resources.string: Please check your login/password. If the problem persists, please contact Natixis support for assistance.
Are you sure you want to exit?

If you already receive by email Natixis Research publications, switch to authentificated mode. This will allow you to access your usual subscriptions. This login stage is only required for your first connection.
Unable to prepare file for sending (check if it\'s correctly downloaded)...
You have not yet configured quick links to your expertise sections.
Are you sure you want to delete this document from your cache ? It will be available in offline mode.
All your favorites and cached documents will be deleted.\r\nAre you sure you want to logout ?
You may contact Natixis support for any question concerning this application.\r\nJust tap the button above and fill in the email form.
What do you want to do?

This application was placed on line by Natixis Wholesale Banking and is exclusively addressed to professional clients professionals, to distributors and to IFAs as defined by the MiFID directive. Those persons not included in these categories may not use this application.\n\nThe information contained in this application is provided by Natixis Wholesale Banking. It is not intended to be distributed or used in a country or jurisdiction where such distribution or use would infringe the applicable laws and regulations, or where such distribution or use would compel Natixis Wholesale Banking and its affiliates/partners to comply with the registration obligations of these countries or jurisdictions.
The application is now going to close because you refused to accept the conditions of use.\nYou may accept them when you next connect.
Are you sure that you want to delete all the documents in your Downloads ?
Use the icon to download a publication. You can then read offline.
Mettez en favoris vos documents préférés afin de bénéficier de la fonctionnalité de consultation hors réseau.
Choose to either read all publications directly online, or select those you wish to read from the drop-down list
Select the expertise sections you regularly read for quick access. (The star icon lets you add an expertise section into selection)
